dogecoin.text:
Dogecoin is stepping into the future—let's all join the ride and see where it takes us! 🌱

You can also check https://t.co/LrdcHXLI9q for more info on #Dogechain

5/ Bridging Dogecoin to DeFi
The first step to entering the chain of memes and dreams is to bridge #Dogecoin to #Dogechain.  You can bridge using the official bridge - https://t.co/Fxk5fo4KRd and in a few minutes, you can use your $DOGE as you explore the DeFi platforms.

NFTs: Mint and trade Dogecoin-themed NFTs (yep, memes included). 🎨
dApps: Play games, use financial apps, and more. All powered by $DOGE!

3/ How Dogechain Works 🤓
Dogechain is a Layer 2 built on top of Dogecoin. It’s EVM-compatible, which means it can run Ethereum-style apps and perform similar functions. So, you get the best of both worlds: the fun and security of Dogecoin + the power of Ethereum’s dApps. 🌉
Dogechain fills that gap by enabling things like decentralized finance (DeFi), Gamefi and NFTs—without leaving the Dogecoin community and all it stands for behind. 🔥

2/ Why does Dogecoin need a Dogechain?
Dogecoin is fun, but it’s missing a lot of the features that make other blockchains powerful (like smart contracts), which shouldn't be as it's an OG chain.

1/ Dogecoin just leveled up! 🎮 
Meet Dogechain, a platform that brings smart contracts to Dogecoin. This means we can now do things like DeFi, NFTs, dApps and everything else that can be done on Ethereum with $DOGE. It’s Dogecoin gaining more superpowers.
